Title: Get Even Before Leavin'
Writer: Chad Feehan, Ann Biderman (created by), Miki Johnson (staff writer), David Sonnenborn (staff writer)
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: Ray goes with Mickey to Primm, to retrieve the money from the recent heist at the Casino. Meanwhile, Abby has some difficult decisions to make about her cancer, Bridget returns home and Bunchy has serious marital problems.
